00054 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00055 
00056 /* Format: [0x64BIT_INT - 0x64BIT_INT] + 32 bytes just in case */
00057 #define MAX_FID_RANGE_STRLEN (32 + 2 * 2 * sizeof(__u64))
00058 
00066 static int
00067 lprocfs_fid_write_common(const char __user *buffer, size_t count,
00068                                 struct lu_seq_range *range)
00069 {
00070         struct lu_seq_range tmp = { 0, };
00071         int rc;
00072         char kernbuf[MAX_FID_RANGE_STRLEN];
00073         ENTRY;
00074 
00075         LASSERT(range != NULL);
00076 
00077         if (count >= sizeof(kernbuf))
00078                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00079 
00080         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00081                 RETURN(-EFAULT);
00082 
00083         kernbuf[count] = 0;
00084 
00085         if (count == 5 && strcmp(kernbuf, "clear") == 0) {
00086                 memset(range, 0, sizeof(*range));
00087                 RETURN(0);
00088         }
00089 
00090         /* of the form "[0x0000000240000400 - 0x000000028000400]" */
00091         rc = sscanf(kernbuf, "[%llx - %llx]\n",
00092                     (long long unsigned *)&tmp.lsr_start,
00093                     (long long unsigned *)&tmp.lsr_end);
00094         if (!lu_seq_range_is_sane(&tmp) || lu_seq_range_is_zero(&tmp) ||
00095             tmp.lsr_start < range->lsr_start || tmp.lsr_end > range->lsr_end)
00096                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00097         *range = tmp;
00098         RETURN(0);
00099 }
00100 
00101 #ifdef HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT
00102 /*
00103  * Server side procfs stuff.
00104  */
00105 static ssize_t
00106 lprocfs_server_fid_space_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00107                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00108 {
00109         struct lu_server_seq *seq = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00110         int rc;
00111         ENTRY;
00112 
00113         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00114 
00115         mutex_lock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00116         rc = lprocfs_fid_write_common(buffer, count, &seq->lss_space);
00117         if (rc == 0) {
00118                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Space: "DRANGE"\n",
00119                         seq->lss_name, PRANGE(&seq->lss_space));
00120         }
00121         mutex_unlock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00122 
00123         RETURN(count);
00124 }
00125 
00126 static int
00127 lprocfs_server_fid_space_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)
00128 {
00129         struct lu_server_seq *seq = (struct lu_server_seq *)m->private;
00130         ENTRY;
00131 
00132         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00133 
00134         mutex_lock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00135         seq_printf(m, "["LPX64" - "LPX64"]:%x:%s\n", PRANGE(&seq->lss_space));
00136         mutex_unlock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00137 
00138         RETURN(0);
00139 }

00141 static int
00142 lprocfs_server_fid_server_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)
00143 {
00144         struct lu_server_seq *seq = (struct lu_server_seq *)m->private;
00145         struct client_obd *cli;
00146         ENTRY;
00147 
00148         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00149 
00150         if (seq->lss_cli) {
00151                 if (seq->lss_cli->lcs_exp != NULL) {
00152                         cli = &seq->lss_cli->lcs_exp->exp_obd->u.cli;
00153                         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", cli->cl_target_uuid.uuid);
00154                 } else {
00155                         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", seq->lss_cli->lcs_srv->lss_name);
00156                 }
00157         } else {
00158                 seq_puts(m, "<none>\n");
00159         }
00160 
00161         RETURN(0);
00162 }
00163 
00164 static ssize_t
00165 lprocfs_server_fid_width_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00166                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00167 {
00168         struct lu_server_seq *seq = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00169         int rc;
00170         __s64 val;
00171         ENTRY;
00172 
00173         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00174 
00175         mutex_lock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00176 
00177         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00178         if (rc) {
00179                 CERROR("%s: invalid FID sequence width: rc = %d\n",
00180                        seq->lss_name, rc);
00181                 GOTO(out_unlock, count = rc);
00182         }
00183 
00184         if (val < 0) {
00185                 CERROR("%s: invalid FID sequence width: rc = %d\n",
00186                        seq->lss_name, -ERANGE);
00187                 GOTO(out_unlock, count = -ERANGE);
00188         }
00189 
00190         seq->lss_width = val;
00191 
00192         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Width: "LPU64"\n",
00193                seq->lss_name, seq->lss_width);
00194 out_unlock:
00195         mutex_unlock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00196 
00197         RETURN(count);
00198 }
00199

00201 lprocfs_server_fid_width_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)

00203         struct lu_server_seq *seq = (struct lu_server_seq *)m->private;
00204         ENTRY;
00205 
00206         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00207 
00208         mutex_lock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00209         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", seq->lss_width);
00210         mutex_unlock(&seq->lss_mutex);
00211 
00212         RETURN(0);
00213 }

00229 struct fld_seq_param {
00230         struct lu_env           fsp_env;
00231         struct dt_it            *fsp_it;
00232         struct lu_server_fld    *fsp_fld;
00233         struct lu_server_seq    *fsp_seq;
00234         unsigned int            fsp_stop:1;
00235 };
00236 
00237 /*
00238  * XXX: below is a copy of the functions in lustre/fld/lproc_fld.c.
00239  * we want to avoid this duplication either by exporting the
00240  * functions or merging fid and fld into a single module.
00241  */
00242 static void *fldb_seq_start(struct seq_file *p, loff_t *pos)
00243 {
00244         struct fld_seq_param    *param = p->private;
00245         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00246         struct dt_object        *obj;
00247         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00248         struct dt_key           *key;
00249         int                     rc;
00250 
00251         if (param == NULL || param->fsp_stop)
00252                 return NULL;
00253 
00254         fld = param->fsp_fld;
00255         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00256         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00257         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00258 
00259         rc = iops->load(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it, *pos);
00260         if (rc <= 0)
00261                 return NULL;
00262 
00263         key = iops->key(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it);
00264         if (IS_ERR(key))
00265                 return NULL;
00266 
00267         *pos = be64_to_cpu(*(__u64 *)key);
00268 
00269         return param;
00270 }
00271 
00272 static void fldb_seq_stop(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00273 {
00274         struct fld_seq_param    *param = p->private;
00275         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00276         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00277         struct dt_object        *obj;
00278 
00279         if (param == NULL)
00280                 return;
00281 
00282         fld = param->fsp_fld;
00283         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00284         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00285         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00286 
00287         iops->put(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it);
00288 }
00289 
00290 static void *fldb_seq_next(struct seq_file *p, void *v, loff_t *pos)
00291 {
00292         struct fld_seq_param    *param = p->private;
00293         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00294         struct dt_object        *obj;
00295         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00296         int                     rc;
00297 
00298         if (param == NULL || param->fsp_stop)
00299                 return NULL;
00300 
00301         fld = param->fsp_fld;
00302         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00303         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00304         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00305 
00306         rc = iops->next(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it);
00307         if (rc > 0) {
00308                 param->fsp_stop = 1;
00309                 return NULL;
00310         }
00311 
00312         *pos = be64_to_cpu(*(__u64 *)iops->key(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it));
00313         return param;
00314 }
00315 
00316 static int fldb_seq_show(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00317 {
00318         struct fld_seq_param    *param = p->private;
00319         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00320         struct dt_object        *obj;
00321         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00322         struct lu_seq_range      fld_rec;
00323         int                     rc;
00324 
00325         if (param == NULL || param->fsp_stop)
00326                 return 0;
00327 
00328         fld = param->fsp_fld;
00329         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00330         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00331         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00332 
00333         rc = iops->rec(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it,
00334                        (struct dt_rec *)&fld_rec, 0);
00335         if (rc != 0) {
00336                 CERROR("%s: read record error: rc = %d\n",
00337                        fld->lsf_name, rc);
00338         } else if (fld_rec.lsr_start != 0) {
00339                 range_be_to_cpu(&fld_rec, &fld_rec);
00340                 seq_printf(p, DRANGE"\n", PRANGE(&fld_rec));
00341         }
00342 
00343         return rc;
00344 }
00345 
00346 struct seq_operations fldb_sops = {
00347         .start = fldb_seq_start,
00348         .stop = fldb_seq_stop,
00349         .next = fldb_seq_next,
00350         .show = fldb_seq_show,
00351 };
00352 
00353 static int fldb_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00354 {
00355         struct seq_file         *seq;
00356         struct lu_server_seq    *ss = (struct lu_server_seq *) PDE_DATA(inode);
00357         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00358         struct dt_object        *obj;
00359         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00360         struct fld_seq_param    *param = NULL;
00361         int                     env_init = 0;
00362         int                     rc;
00363 
00364         fld = ss->lss_site->ss_server_fld;
00365         LASSERT(fld != NULL);
00366 
00367         rc = LPROCFS_ENTRY_CHECK(inode);
00368         if (rc < 0)
00369                 return rc;
00370 
00371         rc = seq_open(file, &fldb_sops);
00372         if (rc)
00373                 return rc;
00374 
00375         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00376         if (obj == NULL) {
00377                 seq = file->private_data;
00378                 seq->private = NULL;
00379                 return 0;
00380         }
00381 
00382         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(param);
00383         if (param == NULL)
00384                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00385 
00386         rc = lu_env_init(&param->fsp_env, LCT_MD_THREAD);
00387         if (rc != 0)
00388                 GOTO(out, rc);
00389 
00390         env_init = 1;
00391         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00392         param->fsp_it = iops->init(&param->fsp_env, obj, 0);
00393         if (IS_ERR(param->fsp_it))
00394                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(param->fsp_it));
00395 
00396         param->fsp_fld = fld;
00397         param->fsp_seq = ss;
00398         param->fsp_stop = 0;
00399 
00400         seq = file->private_data;
00401         seq->private = param;
00402 out:
00403         if (rc != 0) {
00404                 if (env_init == 1)
00405                         lu_env_fini(&param->fsp_env);
00406                 if (param != NULL)
00407                         OBD_FREE_PTR(param);
00408         }
00409         return rc;
00410 }
00411 
00412 static int fldb_seq_release(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00413 {
00414         struct seq_file         *seq = file->private_data;
00415         struct fld_seq_param    *param;
00416         struct lu_server_fld    *fld;
00417         struct dt_object        *obj;
00418         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00419 
00420         param = seq->private;
00421         if (param == NULL) {
00422                 lprocfs_seq_release(inode, file);
00423                 return 0;
00424         }
00425 
00426         fld = param->fsp_fld;
00427         obj = fld->lsf_obj;
00428         LASSERT(obj != NULL);
00429         iops = &obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00430 
00431         LASSERT(iops != NULL);
00432         LASSERT(param->fsp_it != NULL);
00433         iops->fini(&param->fsp_env, param->fsp_it);
00434         lu_env_fini(&param->fsp_env);
00435         OBD_FREE_PTR(param);
00436         lprocfs_seq_release(inode, file);
00437 
00438         return 0;
00439 }
00440 
00441 static ssize_t fldb_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
00442                               size_t len, loff_t *off)
00443 {
00444         struct seq_file         *seq = file->private_data;
00445         struct fld_seq_param    *param;
00446         struct lu_seq_range      range;
00447         int                      rc = 0;
00448         char                     _buffer[MAX_FID_RANGE_STRLEN];
00449         char                    *buffer = _buffer;
00450         ENTRY;
00451 
00452         param = seq->private;
00453         if (param == NULL)
00454                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00455 
00456         if (len >= sizeof(_buffer))
00457                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00458 
00459         if (copy_from_user(buffer, buf, len))
00460                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00461         buffer[len] = 0;
00462 
00463         /*
00464          * format - [0x0000000200000007-0x0000000200000008):0:mdt
00465          */
00466         if (*buffer != '[')
00467                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00468         buffer++;
00469 
00470         range.lsr_start = simple_strtoull(buffer, &buffer, 0);
00471         if (*buffer != '-')
00472                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00473         buffer++;
00474 
00475         range.lsr_end = simple_strtoull(buffer, &buffer, 0);
00476         if (*buffer != ')')
00477                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00478         buffer++;
00479         if (*buffer != ':')
00480                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00481         buffer++;
00482 
00483         range.lsr_index = simple_strtoul(buffer, &buffer, 0);
00484         if (*buffer != ':')
00485                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00486         buffer++;
00487 
00488         if (strncmp(buffer, "mdt", 3) == 0)
00489                 range.lsr_flags = LU_SEQ_RANGE_MDT;
00490         else if (strncmp(buffer, "ost", 3) == 0)
00491                 range.lsr_flags = LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST;
00492         else
00493                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00494 
00495         rc = seq_server_alloc_spec(param->fsp_seq->lss_site->ss_control_seq,
00496                                    &range, &param->fsp_env);
00497 
00498 out:
00499         RETURN(rc < 0 ? rc : len);
00500 }
00501 
00502 const struct file_operations seq_fld_proc_seq_fops = {
00503         .owner   = THIS_MODULE,
00504         .open    = fldb_seq_open,
00505         .read    = seq_read,
00506         .write   = fldb_seq_write,
00507         .release = fldb_seq_release,
00508 };

00512 /* Client side procfs stuff */
00513 static ssize_t
00514 lprocfs_client_fid_space_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00515                                    size_t count, loff_t *off)
00516 {
00517         struct lu_client_seq *seq = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00518         int rc;
00519         ENTRY;
00520 
00521         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00522 
00523         mutex_lock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00524         rc = lprocfs_fid_write_common(buffer, count, &seq->lcs_space);
00525         if (rc == 0) {
00526                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Space: "DRANGE"\n",
00527                        seq->lcs_name, PRANGE(&seq->lcs_space));
00528         }
00529 
00530         mutex_unlock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00531 
00532         RETURN(count);
00533 }

00536 lprocfs_client_fid_space_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)
00537 {
00538         struct lu_client_seq *seq = (struct lu_client_seq *)m->private;
00539         ENTRY;
00540 
00541         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00542 
00543         mutex_lock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00544         seq_printf(m, "["LPX64" - "LPX64"]:%x:%s\n",
00545                    PRANGE(&seq->lcs_space));
00546         mutex_unlock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00547 
00548         RETURN(0);

00551 static ssize_t
00552 lprocfs_client_fid_width_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00553                                    size_t count, loff_t *off)
00554 {
00555         struct lu_client_seq *seq = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00556         __u64 max;
00557         int rc;
00558         __s64 val;
00559         ENTRY;
00560 
00561         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00562 
00563         mutex_lock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00564 
00565         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00566         if (rc) {
00567                 GOTO(out_unlock, count = rc);
00568         }
00569 
00570         if (seq->lcs_type == LUSTRE_SEQ_DATA)
00571                 max = LUSTRE_DATA_SEQ_MAX_WIDTH;
00572         else
00573                 max = LUSTRE_METADATA_SEQ_MAX_WIDTH;
00574 
00575         if (val <= max && val > 0) {
00576                 seq->lcs_width = val;
00577 
00578                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Sequence size: "LPU64"\n",
00579                        seq->lcs_name, seq->lcs_width);
00580         } else {
00581                 GOTO(out_unlock, count = -ERANGE);
00582         }
00583 
00584 out_unlock:
00585         mutex_unlock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00586         RETURN(count);
00587 }
00588 
00589 static int
00590 lprocfs_client_fid_width_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)
00591 {
00592         struct lu_client_seq *seq = (struct lu_client_seq *)m->private;
00593         ENTRY;
00594 
00595         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00596 
00597         mutex_lock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00598         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", seq->lcs_width);
00599         mutex_unlock(&seq->lcs_mutex);
00600 
00601         RETURN(0);
00602 }

00604 static int

00619 static int
00620 lprocfs_client_fid_server_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *unused)
00621 {

00626         LASSERT(seq != NULL);
00627

00629                 cli = &seq->lcs_exp->exp_obd->u.cli;
00630                 seq_printf(m, "%s\n", cli->cl_target_uuid.uuid);
00631         } else {
00632                 seq_printf(m, "%s\n", seq->lcs_srv->lss_name);

00641 
00642 struct lprocfs_vars seq_client_proc_list[] = {

00644           .fops =       &lprocfs_client_fid_space_fops  },
